briefTitle: Comparison Between PECS BLOCK 2 vs ESP BLOCK in Ocnologic Breast Surgery
officialTitle: Comparison Between PECS BLOCK 2 vs ESP BLOCK in Ocnologic Breast Surgery: Randomized Controlled Trial on Postoperatory Oppioid Consumption
conditions: Breast Cancer, Breast Neoplasms, Breast Carcinoma
primaryOutcomeMeasure: Morphine equivalent consumption in the postoperative 24h in simple mastectomies
eligibilityCriteria:
Inclusion Criteria:

* Patients undergoing mastectomy exclusively for breast cancer
* Presence of written informed consent to the trial

Exclusion Criteria:

* Bilateral breast surgery
* Previous drug use
* Chronic opioid and minor opioid therapy
* BMI \>40
* Allergy or contraindications to taking Paracetamol and Toradol
* Inability to use PCA (Patient Controlled Analgesia)
* Intraoperative opioid administration
* Patients with neuropathy
